headline: Citigroup Inc. (C): Among the Best Beginner Stocks
summary: We recently published a list of Starter Stock Portfolio 12 Safe Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) stands against other best beginner stocks. The US stock market has experienced a turbulent first quarter of 2025, marked by increased volatility and negative returns across […]
